issue.title: m.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://m.youtube.com/shorts/66aAUaPjApA](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.youtube.com%2Fshorts%2F66aAUaPjApA) ### Comment > Не знаю связано это или нет, но на всякий случай отмечу: ранее ни одной рекламы не было, а после последнего обновления AdGuard, появилась. Возможно это просто совпадение и YouTube стал тщательнее вставлять рекламу, а AdGuard просто ещё не научился ее блокировать, либо последнее обновление ухудшило блокировку рекламы. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/e6zd73r0ck08sk0gsggc8sk88wo8k049t48go2pzos.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.12 System version: | `Android 13` Browser: | Opera License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (0),
Self-destructing first-party cookies (0)

**Miscellaneous**:
Protect against DPI DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
AdGuard Base,
EasyList

AdGuard Tracking Protection,
Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List,
Legitimate URL Shortener,
Peter Lowe's Blocklist,
EasyPrivacy

Other:

Language-specific:
AdGuard Russian,
RU AdList: Counters Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/disable-amp/1.0/disable-amp.meta.js`
`https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.meta.js` Other extensions used: | `Kaspersky, встроенная блокировка рекламы браузера Opera` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=and&product_version=4.12&system_version=Android+13&browser=opera&filters=255.21.208.207.20.123.4.241.22.11.225.14.251.101.18.19.1.204.257.15.17.118.256.250.212.3.122.2&dns_servers=https%3A%2F%2Fdns.adguard-dns.com%2Fdns-query&userscripts=https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fdisable-amp%252F1.0%252Fdisable-amp.meta.js%252C%250Ahttps%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.meta.js&android.mode=VPN&android.system_root=false&dns.filters=https%253A%252F%252Ffilters.adtidy.org%252Fandroid%252Ffilters%252F15_optimized.txt&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&https.filtering=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=false&stealth.dpi=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=0&stealth.first_party_cookies=0&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&license_type=paid)
